publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5996 Willie Coffey: Kilmaurs Wild Writers Are Winners—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils of Kilmaurs Primary School on their success in the John Muir Trust’s Wild Writing Competition; notes that the winner of the primary school section was Kilmaurs’ pupil Ailsa McAllan, with fellow pupil Bobby Dunn taking second prize and four other pupils, Lewis Creed, Michael McManus-Hutcheson, Abbie Morton and Emma Shanks, being highly commended, and agrees that their excellent work is a credit to the individual pupils and to the whole school.

S3M-5996 Willie Coffey: Kilmaurs Wild Writers Are Winners—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils of Kilmaurs Primary School on their success in the John Muir Trust’s Wild Writing Competition; notes that the winner of the primary school section was Kilmaurs’ pupil Ailsa McAllan, with fellow pupil Bobby Dunn taking second prize and four other pupils, Lewis Creed, Michael McManus-Hutcheson, Abbie Morton and Emma Shanks, being highly commended, and agrees that their excellent work is a credit to the individual pupils and to the whole school.

S3M-5996 Kilmaurs Wild Writers Are Winners (lodged on 18 March 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Jim Hume*, Bill Kidd*, Alasdair Allan*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Bob Doris*, Rob Gibson*, Christina McKelvie*, Sandra White*
S3M-5996 Kilmaurs Wild Writers Are Winners (lodged on 18 March 2010) Gil Paterson*, Hugh Henry*, Stuart McMillan*, Robin Harper*, Karen Whitefield*
